localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Gambling is not fairer than the stock market

You just have to have a long-term time horizon

Show me a sports book w/these kinds of probabilities for winning https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX https://t.co/GEL6DwXmjZ
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

sharedContent.title: Sports betting today is absolutely a fairer game than the stock market. At the end of the day, there’s a win and loss and it’s directly correlated to numbers.
sharedContent.author: Darren Rovell

localize.full_text:
赌博并不比股市更公平。

你只需要有一个长期的时间范围。

给我看一个有这种赢钱概率的体育博彩https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX。
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 如今的体育博彩绝对是一个比股市更公平的游戏。到了最后，有赢有输，而且直接与数字相关。

localize.full_text:
賭博並不比股市更公平。

你只需要有一個長期的時間範圍。

給我看一個有這種贏錢概率的體育博彩https://t.co/aTqiXqQGTX。
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 如今的體育博彩絕對是一個比股市更公平的遊戲。到了最後，有贏有輸，而且直接與數字相關。
